participant_1.background:
I am single.
I am very close with my sister.
I cannot wait to get my first full time job as a nurse.
I have just completed my education as registered nurse.
I love shopping for clothes.

participant_2.background:
I love to ride horses.
My left leg hurts me daily.
I hope to retire someday soon.
I love having facial hair.

content.text: Hi! I'm a new graduate nurse, and I'm excited to start my first full-time job!
Hi! Congratulations! I'm a retired nurse, and I loved my career.
That's great to hear! What was your favorite part about being a nurse?
I loved helping people, and I loved learning new things all the time.
Those are two of my favorite things about nursing too! What was the most challenging part of being a nurse?
The most challenging part was dealing with the stress of the job. It can be very demanding, both physically and emotionally.
I can imagine. I'm sure it's important to have a strong support system in place.
Absolutely. I'm lucky to have a great family and friends who have always been there for me.
That's wonderful. I'm close with my family too.
That's great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love shopping for clothes, going to the movies, and spending time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like fun things to do! I like to ride horses, go camping, and travel.
That's so cool! I've never ridden a horse before.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will someday.
I hope you do!
Thanks! I'm excited to start my new job as a nurse.
I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I'm glad I met you.
Me too!
